level.heading: Preference.
level.text: Except as provided in sections 20-343 and 20-703, there shall be no preference or priority between real and personal property.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 3-72
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 3-72, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 20-101.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 10-241
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-241, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 20-108.01.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Application of Law 10-241: See Application of Law 10-241 and Emergency act amendment notes to § 20-108.01.
